availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of W. M. Jenkins. Married to Polly A. Jenkins. Father of William Jenkins, Lydia A. Jenkins, George Anne Jenkins, Whitnell Jenkins, Cassandra Jenkins, Fredonia Jenkins, James Jenkins, Joseph Jenkins, and Thomas Jenkins. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 346B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 59.
"George Jenkins (1818-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #19095984, accessed May 5, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19095984.
